scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter ./app exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter ./server-client exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter ./voice exec tsc --noEmit
scripts.knip: pnpm -w --filter ./app knip && pnpm -w --filter ./server-client knip && pnpm -w --filter ./voice knip
scripts.jscpd: pnpm -w --filter ./app jscpd && pnpm -w --filter ./server-client jscpd && pnpm -w --filter ./voice jscpd
scripts.check: sh -c 'EXIT=0; pnpm typecheck || EXIT=1; pnpm lint || EXIT=1; pnpm format:check || EXIT=1; pnpm knip || EXIT=1; pnpm jscpd || EXIT=1; exit $EXIT'
